properties.name: Uetliberg
properties.description: Zurich's "Hausberg". Enjoy an excellent view over the city, lake, and the alpine range. Reachable by train (S10, plus some 15' easy uphill walking), or as a ~1:30h steep uphill hike from the city (tram stop: Triemli).

properties.name: Z端richhorn
properties.description: Stroll along the eastern lake shore to Z端richhorn, for a panorama of the city, the lake, and the mountains. Small beach and large green area to relax. You can take a boat back into the city from Z端richhorn pier (included in the 110 city zone).

properties.name: Z端richberg
properties.description: Enjoy the view above the city and the lake, with the alps in the back. For a short stroll, you can ride the funicular up to Rigiblick (from "Seilbahn Rigiblick") and walk over to the tram stop "Zoo" (all included in the 110 city zone).
